info.title: Zoom SCIM2 API
info.description:
SCIM2 (System for Cross-domain Identity Management) is a specification designed to automate the provisioning of user and group identities across various cloud-based applications and services using SSO services and Identity Providers. The Zoom SCIM2 API provides support for user and group provisioning through the **User** and **Group** resources. See [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/) for SCIM2 API endpoint rate limits.

 SCIM uses HTTP methods compatible with the REST architecture style. The payloads require schema definitions, attributes, and values for requests. With the SCIM API, you can use additional features such as attribute filters and search criteria. 

 While using the SCIM APIs, set the value of the Accept header as `application/scim+json`. 

 **Prerequisites** 
* Zoom Owner or Admin privileges. 
* Business or Education account with approved [Vanity URL](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/215062646-Guidelines-for-Vanity-URL-Requests). 
* [Single Sign-On](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363003-Getting-Started-with-SSO) enabled. 

 ## Authentication 

 The SCIM2 API supports OAuth authentication. To use Oauth 2.0, create an [OAuth app](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/create/) or a [server-to-server OAuth app](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/internal-apps/create/) on the Zoom App Marketplace and select `SCIM2` as the scope for your app. Next, [generate an OAuth token](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth/) for your app and start making SCIM2 API calls.

get.description:
List all groups. Use additional query parameters to filter specific groups.

**Scopes:** `scim2`

**Granular Scopes:** `scim2:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: The start index of the records to be returned.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of records returned in a single API call.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
The type of query: 
* `displayName eq {groupName}` â€” Provide the group's name to filter the response to a specific group.

totalResults.description: The total number of all records across pages.

startIndex.description: The start index for the records.

itemsPerPage.description: The number of records returned with a single API call.

resourceType.description: The resource type. The value is always `Group` for the Group resource type.

location.description: The resource's URI in the `https://api.zoom.us/scim2/Groups/{groupId}` format.

displayName.description: A human-readable name for the group.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `400`
The current filter does not support the filter name: {filter}

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `403`
The request was denied due to insufficient permissions: "Group:Read".

post.description:
Create a new group.

**Scopes:** `scim2`

**Granular Scopes:** `scim2:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

displayName.description: A human-readable name for the group.

resourceType.description: The resource type. The value is always `Group` for the group resource type.

displayName.description: A human-readable name for the group.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `400`
The request body must be in JSON format.
**Error Code:** `400`
The request JSON must not be empty.
**Error Code:** `400`
The "DisplayName" of the request is invalid.
**Error Code:** `400`
Create group failed.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `403`
The request was denied due to insufficient permissions: "Group:Edit".

409.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `409`
Conflict **Error Code:** `409`
Group {groupName} exists.

displayName.description: A human-readable name for the group.

Forbidden **Error Code:** `403`

404.description:

Not Found **Error Code:** `404`

Update a group's information.

**Granular Scopes:** `scim2:admin`

requestBody.description: The following schema displays a list of properties that you can update. When you make an update request, include **only** the parameters that you want to update and the `schemas` parameter in the `RequestBody`.

schemas.description: A list of schemas, in `urn:ietf:params:scim:api:messages:2.0:{operation}` format.

displayName.description: A human-readable name for the group.

schemas.description: A list of schemas, in `urn:ietf:params:scim:api:messages:2.0:{operation}` format.

path.description: A string containing an attribute path describing the target of the operation.

path.description: A string containing an attribute path describing the target of the operation.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `400`
The request body must be in JSON format.
**Error Code:** `400`
The request JSON must not be empty.
**Error Code:** `400`
The "Operations" of the request is invalid.

**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `403`

get.description:
Lists all users. You can use additional query parameters to filter specific users.

**Scopes:** `scim2`

**Granular Scopes:** `scim2:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: The start index of records to be returned.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of records returned in a single API call.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
The query type: 
* `userName eq {userEmail}` â€” Provide the user's email address to filter the response to a specific user. 
* `externalId eq {userId}` â€” Filter the response by the user's ID (`userId`).

totalResults.description: The total number of all records across pages.

startIndex.description: The start index for the records.

itemsPerPage.description: The number of records returned with a single API call.

resourceType.description: The resource type. The value is always `User` for the User resource type.

name.description: The information about the user's name.

type.description: The email address label. For example `work`.

primary.description: Whether the email address is the user's primary email address.

workEmail.description: Whether the ability to log in with an work email address is enabled.

sso.description: Whether Single Sign On (SSO) login is enabled.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `400`
Account has not enabled Single Sign-On.
**Error Code:** `400`
The current filter is not supported, the filter name: {filter}

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `403`
The current login user does not have the "User:Read" permission.

post.description:
Creates a new user.

**Scopes:** `scim2`

**Granular Scopes:** `scim2:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

schemas.description: A list of schemas, in `urn:ietf:params:scim:api:messages:2.0:{operation}` format.

displayName.description:
The user's display name.
Note: If you do not add a display name, Zoom generates one by concatenating the first name and last name provided.

phoneNumbers.description: A list of the user's assigned phone numbers.

type.description:
The phone number's label: 
* `mobile` 
* `office` 
* `home` 
* `fax` 
* `work` 

This value defaults to `work`.

primary.description: Whether the role is the user's primary role.

type.description: The group type. This value defaults to `direct`.

primary.description: Whether the group is the user's primary group.

manager.description: The email address of the user's manager.

zoomPhoneExtNumber.description: The user's Zoom Phone extension number. To automatically assign an extension number, set this field's value `0`.

zoomPhoneNumber.description: The user's assigned Zoom Phone number. This value be an unassigned number in the Zoom account.

zoomPhoneSite.description: The Zoom Phone site to assign the user to. If you do not provide this value, the user will be assigned to the main site.

zoomPhoneCallingPlan.description: The user's assigned [Zoom Phone calling plan number](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/other-references/plans/#zoom-phone-calling-plans).

{customAttribute}.description: A custom attribute and its value. This field returns as the custom attribute's name. For example, `currentState` and the `California` value.

zoomUnited.description:
The user's number of [Zoom United licenses](https://zoom.us/pricing/zoom-bundles). The license option: 
* `1` â€” Zoom United Pro-United with US/CA Unlimited. 
* `2` â€” Zoom United Pro-United with UK/IR Unlimited. 
* `4` â€” Zoom United Pro-United with AU/NZ Unlimited. 
* `8` â€” Zoom United Pro-United with Global Select. 
* `16` â€” Zoom United Pro-United with Zoom Phone Pro. 
* `32` â€” Zoom United Biz-United with US/CA Unlimited. 
* `64` â€” Zoom United Biz-United with UK/IR Unlimited. 
* `128` â€” Zoom United Biz-United with AU/NZ Unlimited. 
* `256` â€” Zoom United Biz-United with Global Select. 
* `512` â€” Zoom United Biz-United with Zoom Phone Pro. 
* `1024` â€” Zoom United Ent-United with US/CA Unlimited. 
* `2048` â€” Zoom United Ent-United with UK/IR Unlimited. 
* `4096` â€” Zoom United Ent-United with AU/NZ Unlimited. 
* `8192` â€” Zoom United Ent-United with Global Select. 
* `16384` â€” Zoom United Ent-United with Zoom Phone Pro. 
* `32768` â€” Zoom United Pro-United with JP Unlimited. 
* `65536` â€” Zoom United Biz-United with JP Unlimited. 
* `131072` â€” Zoom United Ent-United with JP Unlimited.

zoomOneBizPlus.description:
The Zoom Workplace plan option.
`16` - Zoom Workplace Business Plus with US/CA Unlimited.
`32` - Zoom Workplace Business Plus with UK/IR Unlimited.
`64` - Zoom Workplace Business Plus with AU/NZ Unlimited.
`128` - Zoom Workplace Business Plus with Japan Unlimited.
`33554432` - Zoom Workplace Business Plus with Global Select.

The Zoom One plan option for Gov accounts:
`16` - Zoom One Business Plus.

zoomOneEdu.description:
Zoom One for Education Enterprise Student.
`576460752303423488` - Zoom One for Education Enterprise Student.

zoomOneSchoolCampusPlus.description:
The Zoom One plan option.
`137438953472` - Zoom One for Education School and Campus Plus with US/CA Unlimited.
`274877906944` - Zoom One for Education School and Campus Plus with Japan Unlimited.
`549755813888` - Zoom One for Education School and Campus Plus with UK/Ireland Unlimited.
`1099511627776` - Zoom One for Education School and Campus Plus with AU/NZ Unlimited.
`2199023255552` - Zoom One for Education School and Campus Plus with Global Select.

zoomOneEntPremier.description:
The Zoom One plan option.
`134217728` - Zoom One Enterprise Premier with US/CA Unlimited.
`268435456` - Zoom One Enterprise Premier with Japan Unlimited.
`536870912` - Zoom One Enterprise Premier with UK/Ireland Unlimited.
`1073741824` - Zoom One Enterprise Premier with AU/NZ Unlimited.
`2147483648` - Zoom One Enterprise Premier with Global Select.

zoomOneEduEntPremier.description:

`4294967296` - Zoom One for Education Enterprise Premier with US/CA Unlimited.
`8589934592` - Zoom One for Education Enterprise Premier with Japan Unlimited.
`17179869184` - Zoom One for Education Enterprise Premier with UK/Ireland Unlimited.

`68719476736` - Zoom One for Education Enterprise Premier with Global Select.

zoomContactCenterPackage.description:
The Zoom Contact Center Plan to assign to the user. Empty value will not assign the user to Zoom Contact Center. The package option:  
* `Essential` â€” Deprecated. 
* `Essentials` â€” Zoom Contact Center Package.

The Zoom Contact Center Plan to assign to the user. An empty value will not assign the user to Zoom Contact Center. Package options: 
* `Essentials` â€” Zoom Contact Center Essentials Package. 
* `Premium` â€” Zoom Contact Center Premium Package. 
* `Elite` â€” Zoom Contact Center Elite Package.

zoomContactCenterAddonsPlan.description:
This is an optional field. The Zoom Contact Center Plan to assign to the user. An empty value will not assign the user to a Zoom Contact Center Add-On package. Add-on package options: 
* `ai_expert_assist` â€” Zoom Contact Center AI Expert Assist Package.

zoomContactCenterRole.description: The Zoom Contact Center role to assign to the user. If you do not provide this value, Zoom assigns the default Agent role to the user.

zoomContactCenterRegion.description: The Zoom Contact Center region to assign to the user. If you do not provide this value, Zoom assigns the main region to the user.

resourceType.description: The resource type. The value is always `User` for the User resource type.

primary.description: Whether the email address is the user's primary email address.

phoneNumbers.description: A list of the user's assigned phone numbers.

type.description:
The phone number's label: 
* `mobile` 
* `office` 
* `home` 
* `fax` 
* `work` 

This value defaults to `work`.

primary.description: Whether the role is the user's primary role.
Whether the group is the user's primary group.

manager.description: The email address of the user's manager.

{customAttribute}.description: A custom attribute and its value. This field returns as the custom attribute's name. For example, `currentState` and the `California` value.

zoomOneEdu.description: Zoom One for Education Enterprise Student

zoomOneSchoolCampusPlus.description: Zoom One for Education School and Campus Plus

zoomOneEduEntPremier.description: Zoom One for Education Enterprise Premier

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `400`
Account has not enabled Single Sign-On.
**Error Code:** `400`
The request body must be in JSON format.
**Error Code:** `400`
The request JSON must not be empty.
**Error Code:** `400`
The "userName" of the request is invalid.
**Error Code:** `400`
The email "{email}" is already in use.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `403`
The request was denied due to insufficient permissions: "User:Edit".

409.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `409`
Conflict **Error Code:** `409`
The email domain does not match the associated domain of the account, please contact Zoom Customer Support to set up if necessary.
**Error Code:** `409`
Cannot add paid users.
**Error Code:** `409`
The Zoom United Plan is invalid.
**Error Code:** `409`
Cannot create more users with Zoom United Plan.
**Error Code:** `409`
Cannot create more users with Zoom Workplace Business Plus.
**Error Code:** `409`
Cannot create more users with Zoom Workplace Enterprise Premier.
**Error Code:** `409`
Cannot create more users with Zoom Workplace for Education School and Campus Plus.
**Error Code:** `409`
Cannot create more users with Zoom Workplace for Education Enterprise Premier.
**Error Code:** `409`
Cannot create more users with Zoom Workplace for Education Enterprise Student.
**Error Code:** `409`
Cannot create more users with Zoom Workplace Pro Plus.

get.description:
Returns information about a specific user.

**Scopes:** `scim2`

**Granular Scopes:** `scim2:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

resourceType.description: The resource type. The value is always `User` for the User resource type.

name.description: The information about the user's name.

type.description: The email address label. For example, `work`.

primary.description: Whether the email address is the user's primary email address.

phoneNumbers.description: A list of the user's assigned phone numbers.

type.description:
The phone number's label: 
* `mobile` 
* `office` 
* `home` 
* `fax` 
* `work` 

This value defaults to `work`.

primary.description: Whether the role is the user's primary role.

manager.description: The email address of the user's manager.

workEmail.description: Whether login using work email address is enabled.

sso.description: Whether Single Sign On (SSO) login is enabled.

zoomOneEdu.description: Zoom One for Education Enterprise Student

zoomOneSchoolCampusPlus.description: Zoom One for Education School and Campus Plus

zoomOneEduEntPremier.description: Zoom One for Education Enterprise Premier

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `400`
Account has not enabled Single Sign-On.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `403`
The request was denied due to insufficient permissions: "User:Read".

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `404`
User does not exist.

put.description:
Updates a user's information. 

**Scopes:** `scim2`

**Granular Scopes:** `scim2:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

requestBody.description: This schema displays a list of properties that you can update. When you make an update request, include **only** the parameters that you want to update and the `schemas` parameter in the request body.

schemas.description: A list of schemas in `urn:ietf:params:scim:api:messages:2.0:{operation}` format.

active.description:
Whether to activate the user: 
* `true` â€” Activate user. 
* `false` â€” Deactivate user.

displayName.description:
The user's display name.
Note: Zoom does not update the display name if you update the first name or last name. You must send a new displayName if you change these values.

phoneNumbers.description: A list of the user's assigned phone numbers.

type.description: The label of the phone number: `mobile`, `office`, `home`, `fax`. If you do not provide a label, Zoom assigns the default label value: `work`

primary.description: Whether the role is the user's primary role.

type.description: The group type. This value defaults to `direct`.

primary.description: Whether the group is the user's primary group.

manager.description: The email address of the user's manager.

zoomPhoneExtNumber.description: The user's Zoom Phone extension number. To automatically assign an extension number, set this field's value `0`.

zoomPhoneNumber.description: The user's assigned Zoom Phone number. This value must be an unassigned number in the Zoom account.

zoomPhoneSite.description: The Zoom Phone site to assign the user to. If you do not provide this value, Zoom assigns the user to the main site.

zoomPhoneCallingPlan.description: The user's assigned [Zoom Phone calling plan number](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/other-references/plans/#zoom-phone-calling-plans). To remove all calling plans, set the value of `zoomPhoneCallingPlan` to -1.

{customAttribute}.description: A custom attribute and its value. This field returns the custom attribute's name. For example, `currentState` and the `California` value.

zoomUnited.description:
The user's number of [Zoom United licenses](https://zoom.us/pricing/zoom-bundles). The license option: 
* `1` â€” Zoom United Pro-United with US/CA Unlimited. 
* `2` â€” Zoom United Pro-United with UK/IR Unlimited. 
* `4` â€” Zoom United Pro-United with AU/NZ Unlimited. 
* `8` â€” Zoom United Pro-United with Global Select. 
* `16` â€” Zoom United Pro-United with Zoom Phone Pro.

* `1024` â€” Zoom United Ent-United with US/CA Unlimited. 
* `2048` â€” Zoom United Ent-United with UK/IR Unlimited. 
* `4096` â€” Zoom United Ent-United with AU/NZ Unlimited. 
* `8192` â€” Zoom United Ent-United with Global Select. 
* `16384` â€” Zoom United Ent-United with Zoom Phone Pro. 
* `32768` â€” Zoom United Pro-United with JP Unlimited. 
* `65536` â€” Zoom United Biz-United with JP Unlimited. 
* `131072` â€” Zoom United Ent-United with JP Unlimited.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `404`
User does not exist.

patch.description:
Activate or deactivate a user.

**Scopes:** `scim2`

**Granular Scopes:** `scim2:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

schemas.description: A list of schemas, in `urn:ietf:params:scim:api:messages:2.0:{operation}` format.

op.description: The operation name. This value must be `replace`.

active.description: Whether the user is active. Set this value to `false` to deactivate the user.

resourceType.description: The resource type. The value is always `User` for the User resource type.

type.description: The email address label. For example, `work`.

primary.description: Whether the email address is the user's primary email address.

phoneNumbers.description: A list of the user's assigned phone numbers.

type.description:
The phone number's label: 
* `mobile` 
* `office` 
* `home` 
* `fax` 
* `work` 

This value defaults to `work`.

primary.description: Whether the role is the user's primary role.
Whether the group is the user's primary group.

{customAttribute}.description: A custom attribute and its value. This field returns the custom attribute's name and value. For example, the `currentState` attribute name and the `California` value.

zoomOneEdu.description: Zoom One for Education Enterprise Student

zoomOneSchoolCampusPlus.description: Zoom One for Education School and Campus Plus

zoomOneEduEntPremier.description: Zoom One for Education Enterprise Premier

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `400`
Account has not enabled Single Sign-On.
**Error Code:** `400`
The request body must be in JSON format.
**Error Code:** `400`
The request JSON must not be empty.
**Error Code:** `400`
User is force inactive.
**Error Code:** `400`
Cannot activate or deactivate Zoom Room and Admin users.

Forbidden **Error Code:** `403`
The request was denied due to insufficient permissions: "User:Edit".
